Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 DISPLAY OPERATION Pro Line Fusion® Avionics DU Window Allocation

MFW Formats per DU

Format Copies Copies/DU1 Copies/Side2 Copies/Flt Deck3

ADI 1 1 2

Chart (Single IFIS) 1 2 2

Chart (Dual IFIS) 1 1 2

Checklist 1 1 2

Database Load 1 1 1

Database Status 1 1 1

Document Reader (Single IFIS)

1 1 2

Document Reader (Dual IFIS)

1 1 2

eCDU 2 2 2

EICAS 1 1 2

FMS Format 2 2 4

GMS 1 1 1

DL GWXFormat 1 2 4

1 Copies per DU is the maximum window for- mats simultaneously displayed in the Display Unit.

2 Copies per side is the maximum window formats that can be simultaneously displayed per side of the Flight Deck.

3 Copies per Flight Deck is the maximum window formats simultaneously displayed in the Flight Deck.

4 Copies shown for overlays are for Dual FMS conﬁgurations with 4 Maps and 2 HSIs per FD. For single FMS, there would be only 2 Map and 2 HSIs per Flight Deck.

5th Edition 02 APR 19 7-33

GWX Overlay on Map4 1 2 4

HSI 1 1 2

HSI Flt Pln Map (Single or Dual FMS)

1 1 2

Information Management 1 1 1

LX Overlay 1 2 4

Maintenance 1 1 1

MFW Map (Single FMS) 1 2 2

MFW Map (Dual FMS) 1 2 4

Radio Tune 1 2 4

ROUTE Sub-window4 1 2 4

SVS 1 1 2

Synoptics 2 2 2

TAWS (Terrain)4 2 2 4

Trafﬁc Format 1 2 4

Trafﬁc Overlay4 2 3 6

1 Copies per DU is the maximum window for- mats simultaneously displayed in the Display Unit.

2 Copies per side is the maximum window formats that can be simultaneously displayed per side of the Flight Deck.

3 Copies per Flight Deck is the maximum window formats simultaneously displayed in the Flight Deck.

4 Copies shown for overlays are for Dual FMS conﬁgurations with 4 Maps and 2 HSIs per FD. For single FMS, there would be only 2 Map and 2 HSIs per Flight Deck.

5th Edition 7-34 02 APR 19
